summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3742 for the improvement of the alley between block 48 and block 57, Mount Baker Park Addition, being the alley between Hunters Boulevard and Cascadia Avenue, and extending from Horton Street to Hanford Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45953 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
